data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Gurgaon, Haryana, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gurgaon, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Gurgaon.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Gurgaon, Haryana, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 16,658 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Gurgaon, Haryana, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Gurgaon, Haryana, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 16,658 believers in the county of Gurgaon to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

location.name: Gurgaon
location.people_groups_list: Jat Godara, Jat Johal, Brahmin Sankliwal, Singiwala, Jat Makiwal
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat Godara (29,000), Jat Johal (400), Brahmin Sankliwal (49,000), Singiwala (18,000), Jat Makiwal (19,000)
